results.content: I have no experience at all...I was therefore totally lost since I expected instructions to follow and to be able to peruse again and again until I learned...I am not sure that this course is for people without much knowledgeof the computer and subject matter being taught,

response.content:
Hello Sandre, 

Sorry to hear that you were lost. 

If you have no knowledge of computer then obviously this course isn't for a non tech savvy person. I suggest you to learn computer fundamental training first. 

It is not a theoretical and typical course that I think you were expecting.  It is practical step by step crash training with explanations on how things work. 

Don't buy crash courses if you are a beginner. You may need to buy normal courses because you need deep understanding.

If you need to give me any suggestion, feel free to do it.

- Zeeshan

results.content: course was great, instructor did move fast at times, but the swift pace made for easier timing to finish course all the way through!  Loved it.

response.content:
Thank you so much Tyler! Actually, I made this course in a practical way with focus on beginners while using essential core of languages rather a typical way of course.

I wanted to fulfill one purpose. Blast away frustration and overwhelming of learning for a beginner and give a kick start and experience of full stack at beginner level only in minimum time.

I'm glad that course is going well on this purpose.

Wish you all the best :)
Zeeshan
